Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class Lyric

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.notation.Lyric
public final class Lyric extends Object
Represents a fragment of lyrics associated with single note.

This class is immutable.

  • Method Details

    • of

      public static Lyric of(String text, Lyric.Type type)
      Returns a lyric instance with the given values.
      Parameters:
      text - the text content of the lyrics
      type - the type of the text content
      Returns:
      a lyric instance with the given values

    • getText

      public String getText()
      Returns the text content of this lyric.

      In most cases the text content is a single syllable. In elided lyrics the text content may contain multiple syllables that are elided together.

      If this lyric is an extension, then the text is equal to the previous syllable that this lyric extends.

      Returns:
      the text content of the lyric

    • getType

      public Lyric.Type getType()
      Returns the type of this lyric.
      Returns:
      the type of this lyric
